Class NotificationManager

  • BBjWidget
    • NotificationManager

  • public class NotificationManager
extends BBjWidget

    --------------------------
    Manual
    --------------------------
    The plugin will use the BBjAPI-IDs as follows for each respective Notification (only mind if youÂ´re working on the NotificationControlls themselves)
    IDS WILL NOT BE BLOCKED OUTSIDE OF A NOTIFICATIONS CONTEXT!!!
    1100+ = IDs for the notificationwindows itself and its respective titles
    11100+ = IDs for the notifications respective dismissbutton
    51100+ = IDs for the notifications respective textfields
    101100+ = IDs for the notifications respective timer (only if a timer was given)
    175000+ = IDs for custom Buttons on the Notification
    1000000 = ID for the Icon on the Notification
    ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    simple usage guide:
    initialize an instance of the NotificationManager i.e. mng! = new NotificationManager(1)
    create a Notification with the addNotification method i.e. mng!.addNotification(text, timeout, title, eventhandle, color, image, List, link)
    change the animationmode with setAnimate(true/false) , it is false by default
    ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    optional values are : text, dismiss, title, handle, color, image, buttons, link
    these can be passed null() if not required and will be left out

    if an eventhandle was given to the Notification it will push the event 17 which can be caught by processing event onclick:
    (A Notification has to be cleared manually if it was clicked, which can be performed using the eventhandle delivered by the event and the deletehandle(String handle) method

    if a timeout was given the Notification will be dismissed on the timeout count (in seconds)

    if a color (BBjColor) is given it will change the BackgroundColor of the Notification

    if an image (only BBj-conform formats can be used) is passed it will appear on the left hand side of the Notification as an Icon

    if Buttons are passed every Item in the List will be added as a Button in the Notification.
    to pass buttons simply create a java.util.ArrayList and fill it with NotificationButton Objects, provided in the Plugin
    to create an object call the constructor with new NotificationButton(String text, String eventhandle, int width) and put it in to the List

    if a link is passed, the Notification will get a little button which will redirect the user to given links
    ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

    (This System was reworked in version 1.2)
    You can catch Events related to the Notifications by giving the Manager a Callback on Event id 17 and reading the eventdata passed

    The Events structures are structured as follows:
    An Event of the Type "NotificationEvent" (needs to be imported) will be passed
    Every Event thrown will contain 3 fields:
    Notification : this is the Handle of the Notification the Event was sent from.
    You can use this field to identify the source of the event in your data or use it to delete the Notification.
    Eventtype : This will contain the event that triggered this data to be thrown
    At this version it can contain :"CLOSE" "TIMEOUT" "BTN_PUSH" or "WINDOW_PUSH" with the Event displaying what caused the event to be thrown
    Event : This is the exact eventhandle thrown, could be a handle to the Notification or a Button on such
    See Also:
    []

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and TypeMethod and Description
      voidaddNotification(String text!, int dismiss!, String title!, String EventHandle!, BBjColor color!, BBjImage image!, ArrayList buttons!, String redirect!)

      add a new notification to the system with given properties

      voiddeleteID(int ID!)

      delete the ID of an active notification

      voiddeleteNotification(String eventhandle!)

      delete a specific notification by its eventhandle which has to be given to it when creating it only safe method to delete a notification from outside!

      voidfireNextFromBuffer()

      gets called when the notifications change, it will fire a new notification from the buffer to the displayed notifications if it reaches an amount of less than 5

      voidfirePush(NotificationEvent id!)

      fireevent when a notification is clicked

      voidreposition()

      reposition the entirety of displayed notifications

      voidsetAnimate(Boolean animate!)

      change the animate property which controlls if the animationfeature is used or not

      voidsetInitialOrientationTopRight()

      Sets the starting appearance of the notification to the top right corner of the display.

    • Method Detail

      • addNotification

        public void addNotification(String text!, int dismiss!, String title!, String EventHandle!, BBjColor color!, BBjImage image!, ArrayList buttons!, String redirect!)

        add a new notification to the system with given properties

        Parameters:
        text! Text to be displayed in the body of the Notification
        dismiss! Time in seconds until the Notification will be dismissed automatically
        title! Title to be displayed on the upper section of the Notification
        EventHandle! Handle to be thrown out when a Notification itself is clicked
        color! Backgroundcolor of the Notification
        image! Icon to be displayed on the left hand side of the Notification
        buttons! List of ButtonsMetadata to be displayed on the Bottom of the Notification
        redirect! Link to be linked with the redirect button on the upper right corner (only valid links in Format https://www.examplesite.com)

      • deleteID

        public void deleteID(int ID!)

        delete the ID of an active notification

        Parameters:
        ID! ID of the Notification to be deleted

      • deleteNotification

        public void deleteNotification(String eventhandle!)

        delete a specific notification by its eventhandle which has to be given to it when creating it only safe method to delete a notification from outside!

        Parameters:
        eventhandle! Handle of the Notification to be deleted

      • fireNextFromBuffer

        public void fireNextFromBuffer()

        gets called when the notifications change, it will fire a new notification from the buffer to the displayed notifications if it reaches an amount of less than 5

      • firePush

        public void firePush(NotificationEvent id!)

        fireevent when a notification is clicked

        Parameters:
        id! String to be thrown as an Event

      • reposition

        reposition the entirety of displayed notifications

        change the animate property which controlls if the animationfeature is used or not

        Parameters:
